psychographics.lifestyle: A solitary and analytical lifestyle focused on research and data, with a preference for independent decision-making and a skeptical approach to readily available information. He prioritizes functionality and cost-effectiveness, relying heavily on self-conducted research.

shopping_behavior.research_habits: He conducts extensive self-research using Google, Youtube, and online articles to compare products and evaluate their features. He heavily relies on data and analysis rather than trusting external reviews or sponsored listings.

persona.narrative: This persona is a solitary academic researcher in Boston who prioritizes objective data and self-conducted research when making purchasing decisions. He’s a practical and analytical individual, primarily focused on functionality and price, and skeptical of readily available reviews or marketing, preferring to trust his own research findings when selecting electronics and everyday necessities.
